casebody.data:
Todd HUVAL and Chad Boyer
v.
STATE of Louisiana THROUGH the DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY AND CORRECTIONS, Office of State Police; Master Trooper Hal Hutchinson; Lieutenant Rhett Trahan; Investigator Buzzy Trahan; Lieutenant Kevin Devall; Investigator Bart Morris; Investigator Hampton Guillory; and Lieutenant Colonel Stanley Griffin NO. 2018-CC-0959 Supreme Court of Louisiana. October 8, 2018 Denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.
